DF_CHAT_ENHANCE.ReloadGameContent: Changes will only go into effect on reload. Would you like to reload now?

Settings.HideExport: Chat Archive: Hide the Export Chat Log button
Settings.ArchiveFolder_Hint: The directory where chat archives are stored

DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveNew_Delete: Delete the chat messages from the chat log?
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveNew_ErrorNameMissing: Must provide a name for the new archive!
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveNew_ErrorDatesMissing: Must provide both 'From' and 'To' dates if archiving by date range!
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveNew_NoticeSuccess: The new archive "{0}" has been created
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveManager_NotItems: You do not have any chat archives
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveManager_ErrorBadId: The id for the selected chat archive does not exist.
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveManager_ConfirmDeleteAllMessage1: Are you sure you want to delete all of your chat archives? This cannot be undone!
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveManager_ConfirmDeleteAllMessage2: Last Chance! You double sure you want to delete them all?
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveManager_ConfirmDeleteAllComplete: All chat archives have been deleted
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveManager_ConfirmDeleteArchiveConte: Are you sure you want to delete '{name}'?
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveViewer_DeleteContent: Are you sure you wish to apply all previous deletion?
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveViewer_Merge: Merge an archive into this one
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveViewer_Merge_SelectArchive: Select a chat archive to merge into
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveViewer_Merge_OnlyOneArchive: There are no other archives available for merging
DF_CHAT_ARCHIVE.ArchiveViewer_Error_Delete_All: Cannot delete all of the chats in an Archive. If you wish to delete an archive, please do so from the Archive Manager.

DF_CHAT_PRIVACY.Settings_EnableTitle: Roll Buttons: Replace roll type selector with buttons
DF_CHAT_PRIVACY.Settings_EnableHint: (Requires Reload) Replace the drop-down menu selector for roll types with a set of four buttons.
DF_CHAT_PRIVACY.Settings_ReplaceButtonsTitle: Roll Buttons: Use button style on all chat buttons
DF_CHAT_PRIVACY.Settings_ReplaceButtonsHint: (Requires Reload) Restyle the other chat buttons to look the same as the new Roll Type buttons.

DF_CHAT_LOG.CommandDescription: Submit an event to the Adventure Log
DF_CHAT_LOG.GMCommandDescription: Submit an event to the GM Adventure Log

Setting.EnableHint: Enables the Adventure Log feature for logging events to a journal directly from the chat sidebar
Setting.GmOnlyTitle: Adventure Log: Set Adventure Log GM Only
Setting.GmOnlyHint: Sets the Adventure Log commands to be GM only
Setting.GmOnlyWhisperName: Adventure Log: (If GM Only) All Logs are Whispsers
Setting.GmOnlyWhisperHint: If the above GM Only setting is on, this will make all log entry chat messages be whispers
Setting.UseTimeHint: Include the current time (hh:mm:ss) in the timestamps
Setting.PrintMessagesName: Adventure Log: Post logs to chat
Setting.PrintMessagesHint: Post a message to the chat for new Adventure Log entries
Setting.SortDescendingName: Adventure Log: Sort Newest on Top
Setting.SortDescendingHint: Sort the adventure log with the newest messages at the top of the log, and oldest message at the bottom of the log.
Setting.SimpleCalendarHint: Instead of real timestamps, use a timestamp generated by SimpleCalendar

Error.LibWrapperMissing: You do not have libWrapper enabled. Adventure Log depends on this module and will not operate without it.
Error.ConfigGmOnly: Only the GM is allowed to change the Adventure Log configuration.
Error.Disabled: The Gamemaster has disabled the Adventure Log
Error.NoJournalSet: The Gamemaster has not set a journal for use as an Adventure Log
Error.NoJournalSetGM: There is no journal set for use as an Adventure Log. Use "/log config" to set one
Error.MissingQuote: You are missing the closing quote for {0}
Error.MissingMessage: You did not supply a message
Error.ApiLog_NotGm: You must be a GM to log events to the GM Adventure Log

DF_CHAT_LOG.Config_JournalSelect: Journal to use as the Adventure Log
DF_CHAT_LOG.Config_GMJournalSelect: Journal to use as the GM Only Log
DF_CHAT_LOG.Config_ClearContent: Clear all contents of the journal
DF_CHAT_LOG.Config_GmClearContent: Clear all contents of the GM Only journal
DF_CHAT_LOG.Config_JournalPermissions: Anyone who will log events will need permission to edit the selected Journal.
DF_CHAT_LOG.ContextMenu_AsGmEvent: GM Adventure Log as an Event
DF_CHAT_LOG.ContextMenu_AsGmQuote: GM Adventure Log as a Quote

DF_CHAT_EDIT.Settings_AllowEditHint: Allow players to edit the messages they send
DF_CHAT_EDIT.Settings_GMEditAllName: Chat Edit: GM can edit all
DF_CHAT_EDIT.Settings_GMEditAllHint: Allow GMs to edit anyone's message instead of just their own
DF_CHAT_EDIT.Settings_IgnoreHtmlName: Chat Edit: Ignore Messages Containing HTML
DF_CHAT_EDIT.Settings_IgnoreHtmlHint: Do not allow messages containing HTML to be edited.

DF_CHAT_MERGE.EnableName: Chat Merge: Enable Chat Message Merging
DF_CHAT_MERGE.EnableHint: Will merge messages that were posted close to eachother in time from the same user together.
DF_CHAT_MERGE.ShowHeaderHint: If enabled, will display the message header for each merged message.
DF_CHAT_MERGE.AllowRollsName: Chat Merge: How to Handle Rolls when Merging
DF_CHAT_MERGE.AllowRollsHint: How Roll Messages should be handled.
DF_CHAT_MERGE.SeparateName: Chat Merge: Show Merged Message Divider
DF_CHAT_MERGE.SeparateHint: Show a thin divider between merged messages.
DF_CHAT_MERGE.SplitSpeakerHint: If enabled, messages will be grouped based on the Actor speaking; otherwise all messages from a single user will be grouped together.
DF_CHAT_MERGE.HoverHint: Show a border shadow when the mouse is hovering over a merged chat message.
DF_CHAT_MERGE.EpochName: Chat Merge: Maximum Period of Time
DF_CHAT_MERGE.EpochHint: The Maximum period of time between messages that will allow them to be merged together.

DF_CHAT_SCROLL.EnableHint: Will display a Scroll To Bottom button, and if you are scrolling up through the log, it will prevent the chat log from scrolling down when a new message is posted. Instead it will highlight the Scroll To Bottom button when a new message is posted.
DF_CHAT_SCROLL.ScrollIfYouName: Scroll To Bottom When You Send Message
DF_CHAT_SCROLL.ScrollIfYouHint: If you have scrolled up through the chat log, this will automatically scroll you back to the bottom when you send a message.

DF_CHAT_WHISPER_TRUNC.SettingEnabledHint: Will truncate long recipient name lists for whisper messages.
DF_CHAT_WHISPER_TRUNC.SettingCharLimitHint: The maximum number of characters to show before truncating the recipient names.
